definition: around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
regardless of what's before or after (idiom); rushing blindly into sth
context/the surrounding words/same as 上下文

sentences.english: The biggest accumulating rate occurred around the heading period with a one-peak curve.
sentences.chinese: 增長速率最快時期在抽穗前後，呈單峯型曲線。

sentences.english: What do you do before and after work?
sentences.chinese: 在你工作的前後你都做了什麼？

sentences.english: Some physiological indices of Rana plancyi plancyi were tested before and after hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 實驗測定了金線蛙冬眠前後幾項生理指標。

sentences.english: What were your expectations before and after taking the course?
sentences.chinese: 您在學習這門課程前後曾有什麼樣的期望？

sentences.english: Pull the top session of the dress out for the drapery effect both in the front and in the back;
sentences.chinese: 將裙子的前後壓在裏層的部分抽出，做出褶皺的效果。

sentences.english: Wash your hands before and after instilling the drops in your eyes .
sentences.chinese: 點藥前後要洗手，用乾淨的手帕擦眼。

sentences.english: There was a significant decrease in the subjects' pretest and post-test scores of attitude and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 學生的英語學習態度和動機前後測分數有顯著降低。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhaowei snow solar term, before and after, three categories of patients more.
sentences.chinese: 肖詔瑋介紹，小雪節氣前後，三類病人比較多。

sentences.english: Masticatory efficiency was measured before and after therapy.
sentences.chinese: 並在分根術前後進行咀嚼效率測定。

sentences.english: Can drink lemon tea before and after exercise.
sentences.chinese: 可以飲用檸檬茶，練習前後。

sentences.english: The contrast between the war front and the back area is always startling .
sentences.chinese: 戰爭時期，前後方的對比總是非常懸殊的。

sentences.english: At brush to bite to match, brush the hair to move after placing in bit to match come forward.
sentences.chinese: 在刷咬合面時，刷毛置於咬合面上前後移動。

sentences.english: Our sky chart shows the bright waxing gibbous moon and the planet Jupiter for around mid-evening tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今日的星圖展示了午夜前後明亮的凸月和木星。

sentences.english: I want to know the history of his disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 我要知道他失蹤前前後後的情況。

sentences.english: English names are fairly evenly spread between the halves of the alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英語的姓名在字母表的前後兩半部分的分佈相當平均。

definition: early or late/priority/in succession/one after another
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
